details.publicNotes:
The battle of Good versus Evil, with Neutral caught in the middle, has been timeless and has been studied as an observable law through magic, but some forget that there is also a struggle of Lawful versus Chaotic. With the honour and integrity of a rogue and the zealotry of a champion, Deer Hunters are mutated ruminants who have become cruel pawns of the forces of chaos. While it is true their targets are primarily those who are classified as Evil, the Deer Hunter lacks the situational nuance to comprehend that its actions may do more harm than good. When an outside threat is sneaky enough to seemingly materialize from the shadows, kill its target in a dazzling public display, before escaping their bodyguards or meeting back up with allies, adventurers and civilians alike tend to become paranoid.

 

The Deer Hunter only stands to fight in exceptional circumstances, such as being truly cornered, or fighting to protect people helping it to escape. Most who fight it will need to be quick and have a steady hand on their bow or sword, lest it eludes their grasp and the terror it has sown among civilians will go unanswered.

description.value: The Deer Hunter’s Icicle pick materializes around it’s hoof as it strikes within the same action
Enemies that are frightened are also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the Deer Hunter's attacks

Trigger An enemy damages, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabs}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapples} your ally, and both are within 15 feet of you

You free an ally from restraint.

If the trigger was an ally taking damage, the ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level.

The ally can attempt to break free of effects grabbing, restraining, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilizing}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzing} them. They either attempt a new save against one such effect that allows a save, or attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} from one effect as a free action.

If they can move, the ally can Step as a free action, even if they didn't need to escape.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.DawVHfoPKbPJsz4k]{Effect: Champion's Resistance}
